topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558469a76368726c7f0005c9#post_558469a76368726c7f0005c9
[bq="Too_Offensive"]"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558467766368720c28002893#post_558467766368720c28002893
^she victorion^

here comes the toy nerd stuff:
her torso is a remold of combiner wars "hotspot":http://news.tfw2005.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/10/2015/02/328904_TRA_GEN_VOY_WV3_HOTSPOT_4_1423964410.jpg who is my absolute favorite torso combiner in the line 

unfortunately her arms are repaints of "alpha bravo":http://tfwiki.net/mediawiki/images2/thumb/c/c5/Alpha_Bravo_Generations.jpg/800px-Alpha_Bravo_Generations.jpg.png who's my least favorite of the arms

can't tell who her legs are but they're confirmed to be cars so they're either repaints of "breakdown":http://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0212/3566/products/transformers-generations-combiner-wars-6-inch-action-figure-deluxe-class-wave-2-breakdown-pre-order-ships-feb-2015-2.gif_1024x1024.jpg?v=1422607745 or "dead end":http://orig13.deviantart.net/ccdc/f/2014/336/5/a/generations_combiner_wars_dlx_dead_end_by_transformer_products-d88hkvz.jpg

^~I'm kinda hyped~^[/bq]
~You gonna spend a lot of money aren't you~
